00002  * ESM DH parameter generator

00022 #include <stdio.h>
00023 #include "global.h"
00024 #include "rsaref.h"
00025 #include "esm.h"
00026 
00027 main()
00028 {
00029         R_DH_PARAMS dhparams[3];
00030         unsigned char p0[512],p1[512],p2[512],g0[512],g1[512],g2[512];
00031         int x;
00032         
00033         randinit();
00034 
00035         fprintf(stderr,"Generating 512\n");
00036         dhparams[0].prime=p0;
00037         dhparams[0].generator=g0;
00038         if (x=R_GenerateDHParams(&dhparams[0],512,256,&rs))
00039                 fprintf(stderr,"failed %x\n",x);
00040         fprintf(stderr,"Generating 768\n");
00041         dhparams[1].prime=p1;
00042         dhparams[1].generator=g1;
00043         if (x=R_GenerateDHParams(&dhparams[1],768,384,&rs))
00044                 fprintf(stderr,"failed %x\n",x);
00045         fprintf(stderr,"Generating 1024\n");
00046         dhparams[2].prime=p2;
00047         dhparams[2].generator=g2;
00048         if (x=R_GenerateDHParams(&dhparams[2],1024,512,&rs))
00049                 fprintf(stderr,"failed %x\n",x);
00050         fprintf(stderr,"Printing\n");
00051         printparams(dhparams);
00052         exit(0);
00053 }
00054 
00055 printparams(dh)
00056      R_DH_PARAMS *dh;
00057 {
00058         int i,j;
00059         
00060         printf("#include \"global.h\"\n");
00061         printf("#include \"rsaref.h\"\n");
00062         for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00063                 printf("static unsigned char p%d[] = {\n",j);
00064                 for (i=0; i < (dh[j].primeLen-1); i++) {
00065                         printf(" 0x%02x,",dh[j].prime[i]);
00066                         if (i%6 == 5)
00067                                 printf("\n");
00068                 }
00069                 printf(" 0x%02x};\n",dh[j].prime[i]);
00070                 printf("static unsigned char g%d[] = {\n",j);
00071                 for (i=0; i < (dh[j].generatorLen-1); i++) {
00072                         printf(" 0x%02x,",dh[j].generator[i]);
00073                         if (i%6 == 5)
00074                                 printf("\n");
00075                 }
00076                 printf(" 0x%02x};\n",dh[j].generator[i]);
00077         }
00078         printf("\nR_DH_PARAMS dhparams[3] = {\n");
00079         for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00080                 printf(" {p%d, %d, g%d, %d}%s\n",j,dh[j].primeLen,
00081                        j, dh[j].generatorLen, j==2?"};":",");
00082         }
00083 }
